title: # 15 – Something’s Burning Uncut – Sam Tripoli & Gareth Reynolds
description:
Something’s Burning uncut is the uncut audio from my cooking show “Something’s Burning” on YouTube.

On this Christmas edition of somethings burning that originally aired Dec 24th 2018, I invite Gareth Reynolds and Sam Tripoli to make eggnog and soyrizo waffles. The recipes were a little more complicated than what I had hoped for, but like every episode, it ends up turning out surprisingly delicious.

The Berty Boy Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com  

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: www.bertbertbert.com  

Twitter: www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer   

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer  

Instagram: www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
